results.name: a(n) = a(n-1) - (n-1)*a(n-2), with a(0) = 1, a(1) = 2.
comment: Hermite type recursion suggested by H(n+1) = x*H(n) - n*H(n-1); x=1.
reference: Eugene Jahnke and Fritz Emde, Table of Functions with Formulae and Curves, Dover Book, New York, 1945, page 32.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..800
formula: E.g.f.: sqrt(Pi/2)* exp(-(x-1)^2/2)*(erfi((x-1)/sqrt(2)) + erfi(1/sqrt(2)) + sqrt(2*E/2)). - _G. C. Greubel_, Aug 27 2017
maple: end proc; seq(a(n), n = 0..35); # _G. C. Greubel_, Oct 04 2019
program: (PARI) my(m=35, v=concat([1,2], vector(m-2))); for(n=3, m, v[n] = v[n-1] - (n-2)*v[n-2] ); v \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Oct 04 2019
(MAGMA) I:=[1,2]; [n le 2 select I[n] else Self(n-1)-(n-2)*Self(n-2): n in [1..35]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Oct 04 2019
[a(n) for n in (0..35)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Oct 04 2019
(GAP) a:=[1,2];; for n in [3..35] do a[n]:=a[n-1]-(n-2)*a[n-2]; od; a; # _G. C. Greubel_, Oct 04 2019
